page.title: 05Home life & ownership Sollom
page.content: Comfortable, well nourished, farming life. Varied, well balanced home grown diet. Nearest shops five miles. Domestic animals - dogs and cats. All farms keep guard dogs and a small percentage own fire extinguishers. Most farms are owned by local land owner Lord Lilford, whose present policy is to sell houses, when possible, and incorporate the land into a vast open growing area. Green Belt area, ie unable to be used for house building. Whilst the majority of houses incorporate a bath and an inside toilet, none are connected to the main sewer. Mains water is supplied to all houses, but in some instances (ie dairy farms) these are suoplemented by private artesian wells, because of low pressure. The only source of energy is electric.
